correction_response: This tweet is potentially misleading without further context or confirmation. As of now, there are no official reports or statements from the Russian government confirming that Valery Gerasimov has been fired. It's crucial to verify such significant information from reliable sources before sharing.
note_1_text: Valerie Gerasimov was  on Russian state tv with Putin  hours after this tweet. There has been no official word in his firing.      https://www.unionleader.com/news/military/russian-president-vladimir-putin-meets-with-defence-minister-sergei-shoigu-and-chief-of-the-general/image_0629778e-4457-5ceb-ad47-8bc34d30f5e4.html
note_2_text: There is no evidence to support this internet rumor, even hours after it was originally posted. The author, with his oversized platform, needs to refrain from spreading misinformation.

tweet_text: ⚡️Russian Chief of the General Staff, Valery Gerasimov, reportedly fired today. Gerasimov was very highly regarded, the most important military leader of the past generation, & the architect of today’s Russian Armed Forces. He’s served as the head of the military since 2012. https://t.co/zlEVbCPvZ1
user_description: Husband to @natsechobbyist. Vet. NYT Best-selling Author. Ex NSC/ WH Staffer. Senior Advisor @votevets. Dr. & Senior Fellow, FPI SAIS, JHU. Post - @AVindman
